> Edit: it was a 14 day ban and I had no punishment before like people said i joule be got before a ban

You actually had 3 chat restrictions within a short period of time before your 14-day ban.

Quick question. I thought the punishments went:

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day ban
* Permaban

So how did he have 3 chat restrictions a short period before his 14-day ban? I know there are exceptions that can _escalate_ your penalties (ie 14 day ban to start). Are there also exceptions that can lessen the penalty?

Escalation is something that happens when players continue to exhibit the behavior that got them there in the first place, instead of recognizing the warning and changing their behavior.

The majority of players who receive punishments never receive another and get their account back in good standing. Unfortunately, most of them you read about on the message forums are repeat offenders.

You can absolutely turn around from a punishment and get your account back in good standing. This is the situation that causes more punishments than exist in the escalation schedule.

If I'm understanding you correctly, the determining factor for 'reformed', is behavioral only, and not a combination of the 3 month limit and acceptable behavior in that time frame?

As a result of this, the individual who posted this thread received 3 successive restrictions in a relatively short time span, something which is apparently exceedingly rare?

Yes, I understand that. My question was mostly about how he received 3 chat restrictions before his ban instead of two. I thought it was like 3 or so months before you dropped down a tier in the punishment system. So him getting 3 "shortly before" his 14 day ban is what is confusing me.
